headline: Teledyne Launches New Industrial Image Sensors Designed for Space Applications
summary: Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) has announced today the release of three industrial CMOS image sensors designed for space applications, marking a strategic expansion into the rapidly growing New Space market. Developed and tested in France and Spain, these sensors range in resolution from 1.3MP to 67MP and are tailored for high-demand applications such as Earth […]
